Which sector, in your opinion, plays the most important role in driving the economic condition of a country? Please elaborate with reasons and examples.

In india,economic condition is measured in terms of GDP viz.Gross domestic product.Higher the GDP ,higher the economic growth.India is fast developing nation and even in future it will be counted as the developed  nation.GDP is calculated on the import and export commodities.There are several sectors which plays a important role in driving the economic sector namely,agriculture ,industries,tourism ,banking etc. Just after indepndence our economic condition is not as good then financial commission came into force and india decide to make five year plan to have better economic stability.From 1952 to 2000 we see many ups and downs in economic condition but from there after we see many changes in terms of employment ,poverty , education and even government came up with many plans to make our a developed country.

  As there are several sectors which are playing an important and significant role in economy of our counrty,in my opinion Bnaking sector plays a major role in economy of our country.Bank is an institutional body which gives you monetary help.RBI i.e. reserve bank of india is the central bank of our country.It is bankers of bank.When any bank need any kind of monetary help they goes to RBI.Even when government do need any kind of help or loan for betterment of the country they take it from RBI.There are several norms of giving loans to the bank and other financial institutions.There are private as well as public banks working under RBI ,apart from them there are several rural and other banks also.

          Banking sector is the fast growing sector in present scenerio.There are 18 nationalised bank and other as well.In todays life bank gives you everything from loan to insurance,credit card to debit card,saving account to current account.bank makes our life hassel free.We do not need to carry big amount with ourself there are ATMs available everywhere.Now one can tranfer money from home through internet banking thus saving our time and travel cost as well.Banking sector also helps the other scetors as well.They helps the agricultute sector also.In rural areas bank came up with the term of financial inclusion which means bank opens the account  at zero balance.It gives the money security to the people of rural areas,because of this they intend to invest more in agriculture good.Apart from this there is financial institution named NABARD which work under RBI and gives loan to the people in minimal intrest rate.So it helps in economic growth of our country.

         secondly, it also solves the problem of unemployment  in the country which creates an hindrance to economic growth.It provides education loan so that one may go for higher studies easily and even to abroad for studies.It provides employment to thousands of educated people every year. thus in turn helps in eradicating poverty.On conclusion,Bank is the body which solves your almost every problem related to money and thus helping in economic growth of the county.
